Reviews.Title: Excellent Pix
Reviews.Author: starlessnight86
Reviews.Content: This is a really great camera. It has lots of imaging options and they all turn up great. Only flaw is i wish that it had a permanent image preference option. Everytime you turn it off you have to reset your original options..Other than that, this camera is great!!

Reviews.Title: Gift for my 12 year old
Reviews.Author: mlm
Reviews.Content: She loves it. This is a really good camera she will move alot and take a pic and its perfect! really stable and worth the money for a first time camera or even a long time camera. I think its even better than mine, lol. Good purchase for the money spent!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Cyclebutt
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the money.  I'm a big fan of camera's using rechargeable AA batteries, alkaline back-up in a pinch.  Excellent results as a still camera in ALL lighting conditions.  Great choice of shooting parameters.  Med./Low def. video capability includes zoom while shooting, although zoom speed is WAY too fast/sensitive. Terrible night video quality. Sound quality is good.  Definitely a still camera first, but acceptable video mode is a nice feature.  Recommended buy.

Reviews.Title: Worked great on my Athens vacation!
Reviews.Author: CGH
Reviews.Content: When I decided to go to Athens, I wanted to get an inexpensive digital camera. I found this one here (only $70 at the time) and was disappointed when I heard Kodak was leaving the digital market but I knew they made quality products.One of the first pics I took was of the Acropolis...wow. I was a few miles away on my balcony and was able to get terrific pics from there! Of course the up close pics are beautiful and the videos I took from up top the Acropolis and Mount Lycabettus are amazing!As for the rechargeable batteries, I carried extras but never had to swap them out...except for nitetime recharges.Of course there are always cons but they are obvious. Nitetime pics from a distance only came out blurry, pics from airplanes failed due to light reflecting off of their wings and the audio picked up at higher elevations sounded like crowded city streets due to the wind. I hoped that these would have been possible. Like I said...these were obvious but I had to try anyways.Now that the price is a tad bit over $100, would I buy it at that price? Maybe, only due to the fact that I was originally working on a tight budget. Would I recommend it at this price to others? Yes but hold out just to see if the price comes down.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: lovesamazon
Reviews.Content: This is actually the third of this type of camera we have purchased for our family. It is great size -- small enough to fit in a little purse or even pants pocket. The picture quality is always great and has lots of great settings for every type of situation. I recently went to Disneyland and got some amazing photos of the fireworks over the castle -- which has not be the case with other cameras. I know that Kodak is no longer making cameras but I bought the extended warranty for only $12 and hope to never need to use it. Overall a great product that I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: patti m. shute
Reviews.Content: got it for my son. the only thing is, these things NEVER COME WITH AN SD CARD....IF YOU NEED ONE TO OPERATE THE CAMERA PROPERLY, HAVE IT WITH THE CAMERA IN THE FIRST PLACE INSTEAD OF SEPARATELY.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Angela Leblanc "angieleb13"
Reviews.Content: I don't take a lot of pictures, but this camera fits my need. I would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Nice economical camera
Reviews.Author: 843greenbay
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my grandson for his birthday.  It is his first camera and he was very happy with it.  Easy to operate and I would recommend this for anyone just starting to take pictures.  Great for posting on fb!!!

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Victor F. Cantelmo
Reviews.Content: This model is better than the last one. My last one stopped working and was going to cost me more than I expected so I purchased this one. Use it every day.

Reviews.Title: was a gift
Reviews.Author: tara
Reviews.Content: it was purchased for a 14 year old girl as a gift for her bday. she loves it, the face book easy share is amazing to her. right up her alley.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: SNI2C
Reviews.Content: Picture quality isn't the best even when I try to stay completely still. A little disappointed but at least I can attempt to take pics for special occasions like first day of school, etc. It's just hit of miss if the pic will turn out.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: Michele P. Jackson
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Bought it for my mom and she loves it.  Great buy and super easy to use.  It's compact and just perfect for vacations.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: CENTURY "Joe"
Reviews.Content: No compliants here works well for basic still photos.  Very user friendly.  The additional rechargable batteries w charger makes this an exceptional buy.

Reviews.Title: Still slow to focus!
Reviews.Author: Brandie
Reviews.Content: When I bought an updated version of the Kodak Easyshare I hoped that they had fixed the timing on the focus.  I simply click the picture and half the time I have to retake them because of this focus issue.  I won't buy another.  On the upside, the rechargeable batteries last forever.

Reviews.Title: great little purse camera!
Reviews.Author: Honeybee1076 "honeybee1076"
Reviews.Content: Wanted a camera for my purse and this little thing fits the bill...use it at least two to three times a day for little things that need to be remembered! :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent bundle!
Reviews.Author: Alphabuyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera bundle for my father in law, it works great. very reasonable for the price I paid for it. it also takes great pictures, I recommend it to other buyers.

Reviews.Title: Kodak 14mp on Amazon
Reviews.Author: DocVooDoo "ChickenBones and Tecquila"
Reviews.Content: Excellent deal, the batteries and battery charger are pretty cheap, but other than that this is a great deal.  Very pleased and highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good Articule
Reviews.Author: Aida
Reviews.Content: Is excellent articule. The photos are nitida, good camera. Take photo in days and the nigth, the party, or for remember

14 megapixels
3X optical zoom
